query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS householdInsights (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  batchRunId INT NOT NULL,
  householdId INT NOT NULL,
  portfolioSummary TEXT NULL,
  newsSummary TEXT NULL,
  finalSummary TEXT NULL,
  talkingPoints TEXT NOT NULL,
  portfolioValidated BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  portfolioAccuracy DECIMAL(5, 4) NULL,
  newsValidated BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  newsAccuracy DECIMAL(5, 4) NULL,
  processingTime DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
  status ENUM('completed', 'failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'completed',
  errorMessage TEXT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (batchRunId) REFERENCES batchRuns(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (householdId) REFERENCES households(id),
  INDEX insight_batch_idx (batchRunId),
  INDEX insight_household_idx (householdId),
  INDEX insight_created_idx (createdAt),
  INDEX insight_household_created_idx (householdId, createdAt)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3cxdAvZmDe4snPE.root --database kFJtgTpgUE3TsdNQK7TMEr --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS householdInsights (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  batchRunId INT NOT NULL,
  householdId INT NOT NULL,
  portfolioSummary TEXT NULL,
  newsSummary TEXT NULL,
  finalSummary TEXT NULL,
  talkingPoints TEXT NOT NULL,
  portfolioValidated BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  portfolioAccuracy DECIMAL(5, 4) NULL,
  newsValidated BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  newsAccuracy DECIMAL(5, 4) NULL,
  processingTime DECIMAL(10, 2) NULL,
  status ENUM('completed', 'failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'completed',
  errorMessage TEXT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (batchRunId) REFERENCES batchRuns(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (householdId) REFERENCES households(id),
  INDEX insight_batch_idx (batchRunId),
  INDEX insight_household_idx (householdId),
  INDEX insight_created_idx (createdAt),
  INDEX insight_household_created_idx (householdId, createdAt)
)
